description:
The journey to take Mia home continues, with Satou running afoul the local nobles by disrupting their scheme involving the distribution of healing potions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Death March kara Hajimaru Gensou Inbou
Le complot de l’illusion venant d’une death march
The Fantasy Conspiracy That Started with a Death March
デスマーチからはじまる幻想陰謀
